kDesc
This outfit is what nightmares are truly made of. Get it now while you still can! [#Legal]
Ce costume alimentera vos pires cauchemars. Procurez-vous le tant qu'il en est temps ! [#Legal]
Kostüme wie diese sind der Stoff, aus dem Albträume entstehen. Schlag zu, so lange zu kannst! [#Legal]
Questo completo è la quintessenza dell'incubo. Acquistalo ora, non rischiare! [#Legal]
Este atuendo está hecho de pesadillas de verdad. ¡Consíguelo ya, ahora que puedes! [#Legal]
本当の悪夢とは何なのか、それはこの衣装を見れば分かるでしょう。さあ今のうちにゲットしましょう！ [#Legal]
이 복장은 진정한 악몽으로 만들어졌습니다. 기한 내에 확보하세요! [#Legal]
This outfit is what nightmares are truly made of. Get it now while you still can! [#Legal]
這身套裝是真正的噩夢。趁早立即獲取吧！ [#Legal]
